reviews.text: After staying at the Saville for three nights for a special rate for the Entertainment Card I should have spent the monies and gone elsewhere. I booked ages ago and specified a two bedroom apartment - non smoking. We also requested that the sofa bed be made up. I think that our apartment was a smoking one as there were very strong smells of cigarettes!!!
reviews.title: Be Wary

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Apartment was very small indeed - sofa bed was not made up till 11.30 that night - after three requests.
reviews.title: Saville - Perfect Retreat in Sydney

likes.disliked: — A little bit noise on weekend evenings

reviews.text: Our apartment was on the first level - bedroom on Abercrombie Lane - this was a very noisy room plus curtains do not close properly so light comes in - had to sleep with earplugs in!!!
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.text: Our apartment looked like it needed a huge makeover - very tatty - in fact felt extremely disappointed and told them so when I filled out the guest feedback form and guess what have not heard from them - thought they might touch base to speak to me - but have heard not one thing.
reviews.title: The filthiest hotel I've ever stayed in

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great location but not value for money!!!
reviews.title: Great location, excellent accommodation

likes.liked: — Apartment-style living in the centre of Sydney

reviews.text: Myself hubby and 3 kids have stayed here several time's and never had any problems.
reviews.title: Recommend.
